official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that notwithstanding previous debate disagreement and votes taken authorizing the use of military force in the Persian Gulf, all Members of Congress now desire to express their unified support for the President of the United States and for American and allied forces.

summary.text: Expresses the support of all Members of the Congress, notwithstanding previous debate, disagreement, and votes taken, for the action taken by the President in the Persian Gulf and for American and allied military forces involved.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that notwithstanding previous debate disagreement and votes taken authorizing the use of military force in the Persian Gulf, all Members of Congress now desire to express their unified support for the President of the United States and for American and allied forces.
